nodes.text: Tha'ross was a male Gran salvage foreman of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. During the Battle of Ilum in 3640 BBY he was killed by Sith Empire forces on the Eastern Ice Shelf.

Salvage Foreman Tha'ross appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion-difficulty NPC on Ilum. Though not involved in any quests, killing him is required to complete an Imperial-side achievement.
